main event: An Air Force pilot reported observing a strange, glowing object descending vertically over Selfridge AFB on March 3, 1950.
interesting points: The object hovered at approximately 5,000 feet for about one minute,It was described as having a yellowish glow similar to a house light at night,The object moved erratically, traveling significant distances in short periods,The report highlighted that the object remained stationary in free space for two minutes,Technical experts noted that the object's speed and movements exceeded the capabilities of known aircraft.
witness description: 1st Lt. with over 2,900 hours of flying time and seven months experience as Radar Controller
